How Nations Fare in PhDs by Sex [Interactive]

16 Sep 2014

In this interactive chart Scientific American assembles data collected by the National Science Foundation, tracing the gender gap at the doctoral level for 56 nations. The situation in individual countries varies widely, but as the numbers make clear, there are interesting exceptions to the global trend. Explore in detail here.
